channel.title: Custom armour set[SHOWOFF]
channel.description: this is sort of my first custom set the plate and legs are partially recoulored but i did have to remove and add a bunch off parts the helm is made out of a couple different models the claws are dylans not mine i am [u]not[/u] taking credit for making them so before you go flaming actually think about it for once this is my set of armour [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/20joeiu.jpg[/img] i need hlep making a custom animation for the claws if anyone can help me i will either release or pay them or something

item.title: Custom armour set[SHOWOFF]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:20, topic:361937”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=458215.msg3356323#msg3356323 date=1285910147]

nice set

No its not, now everyone stop bumping, let it die…

Not in your opinion, or in my opinion. But possibly in his opinion. I’m tired of you opinion controlling faggots.
I listen to Classic rock, but that doesn’t mean I wanna hang Justin Bieber. I, personally, dislike him, but don’t
be a fag saying he deserves to die in a well. So this kid made a recolor. You may not like it, but some others do.
Sure, it’s not totally original, but hell, if some people like it, then some people like it. Nothing you can do about it.

I’m saying most people dislike it, and it’s considered spam in the models section because he has done utterly nothing to it, except changing the colors. If he can’t model his own stuff, why is it in the models section?? I really don’t see why your trying to make me look like a fool, yet he has de-repped everyone (nearly) in the “models” section… So one question, am I the fool? Or are you?

In all honestly, you are; but we need not discuss this here. He seems to have de-repped everyone who insulted and flamed him.
[/quote]

In all ‘honest, honesty’, you are a hyprocrite… I am not a fool and I only insulted him as I take this thread as spam which insults me…[/quote]

drop it, you arent helping by starting up a heated discussion again…

Read full topic

item.title: Custom armour set[SHOWOFF]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:3, topic:361937”]This is a black dragon mask, a recolor of dylans claws and some other recolored armor.

Did you even ask dylans permission to use his claws in this model? I highly doubt you did, and I highly doubt he would even let you. Don’t try to argue either, absolutely none of this is your own work therefore it is shit to us.[/quote]
He doesn’t need it. It was a public release, and he credited me. That’s all I ever ask.

Ontopic: Everyone starts somewhere. Try primitive modeling; you will enjoy it a lot more than recoloring previously made models, trust me.

Read full topic
